summary: To adapt to growing threats, the Department of Defense says it must urgently change. We looked at DOD's process for providing senior leaders with the information they need to adjust the size and capabilities of the U.S. military to meet top defense priorities. title: Defense Strategy: Revised Analytic Approach Needed to Support Force Structure Decision-Making
